hadith.text: Haritha b. Wahb al-KhuzaIi reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:May I not inform you about the inmates of Paradise? (And then informing about them) said: Every meek person who is considered to be humble and if they were to adjure in the name of Allah, Allah would certainly fulfil it. May I not inform you about the inmates of Hell-Fire? They are all proud, mean and haughty
